text: @MonkeyTennis14 @ben_watt @NaturalEngland @CRTContactUs @Brent_Council @EnvAgency @ChrisGPackham @WildLondon @Thames21 I'm familiar with Brent Reservoir. It's fed by Silk Stream and River Brent, both fairly sick little rivers, they're really just drainage ditches for large parts of north London. If I remember the reservoir is owned by the @CanalRiverTrust and used to top up the Grand Union Canal.

text:
@IPBES @Europarl_EN @UNBiodiversity @UNEP @unepwcmc @UNCCD @WWFEU @EU_ENV @EUClimateAction @EUEnvironment @EnvAgency @UNDPClimate A new energy source?
Not really.
Plants kept at optimal conditions are a carbon sink and fuel source. UK daily growth rate increase by 16 under glass. 
Better then PV.
Why?  :-)  The plants have to be cleared from PV sites.
https://t.co/lBVNjokTBz

https://t.co/0ORfKW8YBY
